attributes.action: Ensure the UK does not sign up to the Schengen Convention
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To sign up to this protocol would further erode the control of the UK's Border Security.  Schengen Visa's are handed out to various personnel who are not entitled to come to the UK.  To sign up to this protocol would be and open door to undesirables and terrorists.
